item.title: Re: We need a sparring section
item.content:encoded:
We do need something, but I'm not quite sure the best way to handle it.

Sparring in BvS is setup weird. You can't just add someone to your list and then that person will see that you've added them. It's a blind procedure. Both sides need to add each other in order for either to show up.

Maybe a Sparring Forum where each person can start their own thread, and every response in that thread is a request to be added to the list and the original poster can update the original post whenever anyone has been added?

That sounds like a good idea, I'll do that right now.

item.title: We need a sparring section
item.content:encoded: Considering you can get xp/rares through sparring we really need to have a place where we can get names/list our names for sparring :)
